mapper.sql:
FROM member m WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmDelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND ifmmName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ifmmPhone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ifmmEmail LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
select m.ifmmSeq ,m.ifmmName ,m.ifmmId ,m.ifmmDob ,m.ifmmGender ,m.ifmmEmail ,m.ifmmPhone ,m.ifmmZipCode ,m.ifmmAddress ,m.ifmmDetailAddress ,m.ifmmExtraAddress ,m.ifmmSnsDiv ,m.ifmmEmailCheck ,m.ifmmDelNy ,m.ifmmCreatedAt ,m.ifmmModifiedAt
ORDER BY m.ifmmCreatedAt DESC

select m.ifmmName ,m.ifmmId ,m.ifmmDob ,m.ifmmGender ,m.ifmmEmail ,m.ifmmRadioOperator ,m.ifmmPhone ,m.ifmmZipCode ,m.ifmmAddress ,m.ifmmDetailAddress ,m.ifmmExtraAddress ,m.ifmmEmailCheck FROM member m WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
select m.ifmmSeq ,m.ifmmId ,m.ifmmName ,m.ifmmEmail ,m.ifmmUserDiv ,m.ifmmSnsDiv ,m.ifmmSnsImg from member m where 1=1 and ifmmId = #{ifmmId} and ifmmDelNy = 0
select m.ifmmSeq ,m.ifmmId ,m.ifmmName ,m.ifmmEmail ,m.ifmmUserDiv ,m.ifmmSnsDiv ,m.ifmmSnsImg from user u where 1=1 and ifmmName = #{ifmmName} and ifmmEmail = #{ifmmEmail} and ifmmDelNy = 0

select m.ifmmSeq ,m.ifmmId ,m.ifmmName ,m.ifmmEmail ,m.ifmmUserDiv ,m.ifmmSnsDiv ,m.ifmmSnsImg from user u where 1=1 and ifmmId = #{ifmmId} and ifmmPwd = #{ifmmPwd} and ifmmUserDiv = 15 and ifmmDelNy = 0
select c.ifccSeq ,c.ifccName from code c where 1=1 and c.ifcgSeq = '2'
select c.ifccSeq ,c.ifccName from code c where 1=1 and c.ifcgSeq = '1'
